mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE receiver = '' OR writer = #{writer} OR receiver = #{receiver}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, writer, receiver, regdate) VALUES(#{dto.title}, #{dto.content}, #{dto.writer}, #{dto.receiver}, #{dto.regdate})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{dto.title}, content = #{dto.content} WHERE nno = #{nno} AND writer = #{writer}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notice WHERE nno = #{nno} and writer = #{writer}
